createWallet.title: Create Wallet
createWallet.msg1: Blixt Wallet is still at an early stage of development.
createWallet.msg2: If you use this wallet, make sure you understand that you may lose your funds.
createWallet.msg3: There is currently no WatchTower support to watch your channels while you are offline.

sendOnChain.title: Welcome to Blixt Wallet!
sendOnChain.msg1: To get started, send on-chain funds to the bitcoin address to the right.
sendOnChain.msg2: A channel will automatically be opened for you.

doBackup.msg1: Thank you for using Blixt Wallet!
doBackup.msg2: We recommend making a backup of the wallet so that you can restore your funds in case of a phone loss.

newChannelBeingOpened.info: A new channel is in the process of being opened...

help.title: Help
help.msg1: If you run into problems or have feedback, you can contact Blixt Wallet developers by filing an issue on Github or by contacting us via email.
help.msg2: You are also welcome to join our public Telegram chat group.
help.msg3: As Blixt Wallet is a new wallet, we need feedback on common issues that you might encounter.

syncedToChain.title: Syncing in progress
syncedToChain.msg1: Blixt Wallet is currently syncing the blockchain.
syncedToChain.msg2: Once your wallet is in sync with the blockchain, on-chain transactions and funds will be recognized and can be seen from the Bitcoin on-chain section.
syncedToChain.msg3: Blixt Wallet is in sync with the blockchain.

recoveryMode.title: Recovering progress
recoveryMode.msg2: Check the Lightning Channels & On-chain sections

setNoteDialog.title: Note
setNoteDialog.text: Set a note for this transaction

web.info.title: Interactive demo
web.info.pressToTry: Press to try out Blixt Wallet!

createInvoice.title: Create invoice
createInvoice.alert: Before you can receive, you need to open a Lightning channel.

lsp.msg: A payment channel by Dunder LSP will be opened when this invoice is paid.

createBlixtLspInvoice.title: Channel opening
createBlixtLspInvoice.msg: In order to accept a payment for this invoice, a channel on the Lightning Network has to be opened.
createBlixtLspInvoice.msg1: This requires a one-time fee of approximately
createBlixtLspInvoice.alert: Failed to connect to Dunder, please try again later.

receive.dunderLspInfo.title: About Dunder LSP
receive.dunderLspInfo.msg: Dunder is a Lightning Service Provider (LSP) that automatically opens channels for you when you don't have enough inbound liquidity.
receive.dunderLspInfo.msg1: This could for example be the case when you first start using Blixt Wallet.
receive.dunderLspInfo.msg2: As this requires an on-chain transaction, a Bitcoin transaction fee will be deducted from the incoming payment. Future payments will be able to use the newly opened payment channel with the Lightning network.
receive.dunderLspInfo.msg5: software and you may change the default service provider in Settings.

torPrompt.title: Enable Tor
torPrompt.text1: It looks like you're trying to open a channel to a node that is running under a Tor onion service.
torPrompt.text2: In order to connect you need to active Tor for Blixt Wallet.

address.title: Send Bitcoin on-chain to this address

layout.title: Login request
layout.msg: Do you want to login to

add.title: Add to Contact List
add.msg: Would you like to add {{lightningAddress}} to your contact list?

alreadyExists.msg: Payment code for {{domain}} is in your contact list

add.title: Add to Contact List
add.msg: Would you like to add this payment code to {{domain}} to your contact list?

payerData.sendNameWithComment: Send my name together with this comment

name.ask: Send my name together with this payment
name.mandatory: Your name has to be sent together with this payment

error.mustProvideComment: You must provide a comment if you choose to include your name to this payment

aes.domain: Got a secret encrypted message from

aboutLightningAddress.title: About Lightning Address
aboutLightningAddress.msg2: is a way of paying a person or a service on the Lightning Network.
aboutLightningAddress.msg3: They look like email addresses, but instead of sending an email to the recipient, you're sending money.
aboutLightningAddress.msg4: Blixt Wallet has full support for sending to a Lightning Address, but receiving
aboutLightningAddress.msg5: via a Lightning Address is still being worked on.

addToContactList.title: Add to Contact List
addToContactList.msg: Would you like to add this withdrawal code to {{domain}} to your contact list?

layout.title: Contacts & Services
layout.lightningAddressAlreadyExists: already exists in your contact list
layout.whyNotAdd: Why not add a Lightning Address contact by

syncBalance.title: Remote balance
syncBalance.error: Invalid operation, contact doesn't have an LNURL-withdraw code

send.title: Send
send.couldNotPay: Could not pay to this LNURL-pay code
send.invalidResponse: The response was not an LNURL-pay response (got {{response}})
send.invalidOperation: Invalid operation, contact neither has LUD-16 identifier or LNURL-pay code

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.couldNotPay: Could not pay to this LNURL-pay code
withdraw.invalidResponse: The response was not an LNURL-pay response (got {{response}})
withdraw.invalidOperation: Invalid operation, contact doesn't have an LNURL-withdraw code

deleteContact.title: Contact deletion
deleteContact.msg: Are you sure you want to delete contact {{contact}}?

webLN.browser.close: Do you wish to close the browser?

dialog.msg2: Keysend lets you pay another Blixt Wallet (or any Lightning node that supports keysend) without requiring an invoice.
dialog.msg3: Click on the camera to scan another wallet's QR code or provide a public key and route hints below.

dialog.msg:
Choose a name that will be used in transactions.

Your name will be seen in invoices to those who pay you as well as people you pay to.

saveGeolocation.title: Save geolocation of transaction
saveGeolocation.subtitle: Locally save the location of a transaction

remove.title: Remove mnemonic from device
remove.subtitle: Permanently remove the seed from this device

dialog.title: Remove seed
dialog.msg: This will permanently remove the seed from this device. Only do this if you have backed up your seed!

googleCloud.title: Google Drive channel backup
googleCloud.subtitle: Automatically backup channels to Google Drive

googleCloudForce.title: Manually trigger Google Drive Backup
googleCloudForce.alert: Backed up channels to Google Drive

dialog.title: Not recommended
dialog.msg:
Warning. It is not recommended to disable scheduled chain sync.

Make sure you keep up-to-date with the network otherwise you risk losing your funds.

Only do this if you're know what you're doing.

node.title: Bitcoin Node
node.subtitle: Set Bitcoin node (BIP157) to connect to

setDialog.title: Set Node
setDialog.info: Set a BIP157-supporting Bitcoin node to establish a connection to.
setDialog.leaveBlankToSearch: Leave blank to let Blixt Wallet search on the Bitcoin network for a valid node.
setDialog.longPressToReset: To reset to the default node ({{defaultNode}}), long-press on the setting.

restoreDialog.title: Restore node
restoreDialog.msg: Would you like to restore to the default node

restartDialog.title: Restart required
restartDialog.msg: Blixt Wallet has to be restarted before the new configuration is applied.
restartDialog.msg1: Would you like to do that now?

zmqRawBlock.title: Set bitcoind ZMQ Raw Block Host

zmqRawTx.title: Set bitcoind ZMQ Raw Tx Host

inbound.title: Inbound channel services
inbound.subtitle: Use an inbound channel service for receiving payments

dialog.title: Incoming channel provider
dialog.msg1: Choose an incoming channel provider and press Continue.
dialog.msg2: Your web browser will be opened to the corresponding provider's website, where you will be able to request a channel.
dialog.msg3: When you're done, you can copy the address code and/or open the link using Blixt Wallet.

restoreDialog.title: Restore Dunder Server
restoreDialog.msg: Would you like to restore to the default Dunder server

graphSync.title: Wait for graph sync before paying
graphSync.subtitle: Synchronized graph leads to optimal payment paths

appLog.title: Copy app log to local storage

lndLog.title: Copy lnd log to local storage
lndLog.subtitle: Reached from /sdcard/BlixtWallet

LSP.title: Enable Dunder LSP
LSP.subtitle: HIGHLY EXPERIMENTAL. Lightning Service Provider that helps with inbound liquidity

MPP.title: Enable Multi-Path Payments
MPP.subtitle: Payments can take up to 16 paths

enabled.title: Restart app and enable Tor
enabled.msg1: Enabling Tor will make the wallet connect to its peers (both Bitcoin and Lightning Network peers) via the Tor Network.
enabled.msg2: You'll also be able to connect and open channels to Lightning nodes that uses onion services.
enabled.msg3: WARNING: Blixt Wallet will still talk to the following services without Tor
enabled.msg5: Reason: To get the current block height
enabled.msg8: WebLN Browser and LNURL will also not use Tor.

disabled.title: Restart app and disable Tor
disabled.msg1: Disabling Tor requires an app restart.

onion.title: Show Tor onion service
onion.subtitle: For connecting and opening channels to this wallet

demo.title: Activate Demo Mode
demo.subtitle: Used for promo. Restart app to reset

rescanWallet.title: Rescan wallet
rescanWallet.subtitle: Rescan the blockchain for wallet transactions

demoMode.title: Activate Demo Mode
demoMode.subtitle: Used for promo. Restart app to reset

settings.about.title: About Blixt Wallet
settings.about.msg5: and other amazing open source software
settings.about.msg6: Tor icon is licensed under CC BY 3.0 by

settings.removePincodeAuth.title: Enter current pincode to remove pincode

settings.torShowOnionAddress.title: Tor Onion Service
settings.torShowOnionAddress.msg1: Scan this QR code to open a channel to this wallet

welcome.addFunds.title: Add funds
welcome.addFunds.msg1: To start using Lightning in Blixt Wallet
welcome.addFunds.msg2: send bitcoins to the address above

autopilot.title: Auto-open channels
autopilot.msg: Open channels when on-chain funds are available

done.title: Almost done!
done.msg1: Here are some wallet settings you can set up to your liking
done.msg2: When you are ready, press continue

alert.title: Try again
alert.msg: Sorry, you wrote the words in the wrong order, please try again.

backup.title: Cloud Backup
backup.msg: In order for your off-chain funds to stay secure in the case of a device loss, we recommend you to keep channels backed up to Google Drive.
backup.msg1: This will keep an encrypted backup of your channels that can only be used together with the wallet seed.
backup.msg2: When you are ready, press continue.

backup.title: iCloud Backup
backup.msg: In order for your off-chain funds to stay secure in the case of a device loss, we recommend you to keep channels backed up to iCloud.
backup.msg1: This will keep an encrypted backup of your channels that can only be used together with the wallet seed.
backup.msg2: When you are ready, press continue.

restore.title: Restore wallet
restore.msg: To restore your wallet, write each word from your seed separated by a space.
restore.msg1: If you wish to restore your Lightning Network channels, you need to provide a file backup.

channel.title: Channel backup
channel.file: Choose channel backup file on disk

welcome.seed.title: Welcome to Blixt Wallet!
welcome.seed.msg1: Write it down on a piece of paper and store it in a safe place.
welcome.seed.msg2: Should you lose access to your wallet
welcome.seed.msg3: you may be able to recover your funds by using your backup seed.
welcome.seed.msg4: The seed standard being used is aezeed.
